attributes.action: Introduce sports doping laws to music and perfoming arts to encourge good artist and discourage doping
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Marion Jones has to return all of her prize money dating back to 2000 because of doping." That was news...but the likes of Moss, Winehouse, Doherty et al receive awards for drug performances in music and the arts. Same dope laws in sports should be applied to music and the arts to ensure credit is give to deserving people instead of to drug enhanced performance.
